description:
More saving. More doing. On the go.
 
ENHANCED SHOPPING FROM YOUR MOBILE DEVICE
Browse and shop for over 600,000 home improvement products: appliances, bathroom, decorating ideas, kitchen remodeling, patio furniture, power tools, BBQ grills, carpeting, lumber, concrete, lighting, ceiling fans and more!  Plus, save with free shipping to home or store on more than 500,000 items.
 
BUY NOW, PICK UP IN STORE OR SHIP TO STORE
The Home Depot's Pick Up In Store and Ship to Store options offers you the convenience of placing an order on the app and subsequently picking up your item(s) at a Home Depot store location. This feature not only saves you shipping charges but also helps you expedite any time-sensitive projects.   Our Ship to Store features more than 300,000 items that can be shipped free of charge when you order online or in our app.
 
STORE LOCATOR
Find the closest Home Depot location by using our Store Finder. It directions, store phone number, hours of operation, and services offered (truck rental, key making, tool rental, etc..).
 
STORE LAYOUT
View detailed store maps to help you find your way to what you need.  Tap on the aisle location of a product and see that item plotted on a map.
 
REVIEWS
Use the barcode reader to scan an item and read what other customers have to say. Use the Home Depot app to write your own reviews and even upload an image.
 
VOICE SEARCH
Simply speak the item into our search for a fast and convenient way to find what you need.
 
IN STORE EXPERIENCE
If your GPS and location services are turned on, the Home Depot app will detect when you are in the store and provide a special store specific menu that helps you find items in the store, see local ad, and see what workshops are scheduled for that store.  Note: continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
 
GIFT CARDS & PASSBOOK
Need a last minute gift for someone? Send an eGift card to someone’s inbox instantly from the Home Depot app.  Plus, iPhone users can even import the eGift card into Passbook.

Keep the great feedback coming – email apphelp@homedepot.com and let us know how we are doing.
releaseNotes:
-CHAT WITH US: Text with customer service associates for help using the app, selecting the right product or questions about your order.
-WEEKLY SPECIALS: New Local Ad makes it faster and easier to shop our sales flyer, including those Black Friday specials you love.

Keep the great feedback coming – email apphelp@homedepot.com and let us know how we are doing.
